    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1867</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Torah</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Torah</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Torah</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Torah</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Torah</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Torah</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Torah</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This resource contains the texts of all pars of The Torah ,also known as the Chumash, Pentateuch or Five Books of Moses.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Judaism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Torah</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Bible</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">religion.</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Hilfsmittel enthält die Texte aller 
Gleichheiten des Torah, alias des Chumash, des Pentateuch oder fünf 
Bücher Moseses.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette ressource contient les textes de tous les 
pairs du Torah, également connus sous le nom de Chumash, Pentateuch 
ou cinq livres de Moïse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este recurso contem os textos de todos os pars do 
Torah, sabidos também como o Chumash, Pentateuch ou cinco livros de 
Moses.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa risorsa contiene i testi di tutti i pars 
del Torah, anche conosciuti come il Chumash, Pentateuch o cinque libri
di Moses.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς περιέχει τα κείμενα 
όλων των ισοτιμιών του Torah, επίσης γνωστών ως Chumash, 
Pentateuch ή πέντε βιβλία του Μωυσή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este recurso contiene los textos de todas las 
igualdades del Torah, también conocidas como el Chumash, Pentateuch o
cinco libros de Moses.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Judentum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Torah</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bibel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
